name: Approved High-Value Purchases
query:
SELECT
    name AS "PAR Name:Link/Purchase Approval Request:200",
    requester AS "Requester:Link/User:180",
    total_amount AS "Total Amount:Currency:150",
    approved_by AS "Approved By:Link/User:180",
    modified AS "Approved Date:Date:150"
FROM `tabPurchase Approval Request`
WHERE status = 'Approved'
  AND priority = 'High'
  AND total_amount >= 100000
ORDER BY total_amount DESC
